metadata.title: CVE-2024-11703 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: On Android, Firefox may have inadvertently allowed viewing saved passwordswithout the required device PIN authentication. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 133.

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs68: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
